summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 regarding a quote request for security camera installation work at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). A facilities manager at MCC contacts a sales representative from SigNet Technologies to discuss pricing and the need for drawings or a site visit.

keyFacts: The document is a business email chain concerning a security installation quote for the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019.
The correspondence involves a facilities manager at MCC and a sales representative from SigNet Technologies, a federal solutions contractor.
The content is routine procurement discussion, focusing on the need for project drawings and a potential site visit to formulate a bid.
The document carries a sensitive/privileged communication warning from the U.S. Department of Justice, indicating its official nature.
